name: Embers (kets, mlodydobry, Tystnex, rajstopa)
description:
this is fine. Playing as a little flame in this puzzle game prototype, try to reach your friends and burn everything on your way.

The game was made during GMTK Game Jam 2021 for the Joined Together theme. We tried to create a single-player puzzle game (please keep in mind we suck at designing puzzles) which would be relaxing yet at times challenging.

The game has currently four levels, you can finish each one of them (we tried our best to test it).

This time we tried to make every asset by ourselves, so the credit (except for the music) is all ours.

Warning: The game is highly unfinished. We didn't manage to make it (and test it) on time. Please keep that in mind. Thanks and good luck!

Controls:
  • Use WASD/arrow keys to move
  • Gamepad support implemented
  • That's it, I think
Our Team:
  • HUD/UI, level design, making sure we keep our cool: Aleksandra Nowakowska
  • Blueprint wizard: Michal Paszek
  • Level Design and the cutest fire particle ever: Dominik Madzia
  • Complaining at how the game looks: Martyna Ziolkowska
Music by: https://www.purple-planet.com
